news.title: Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers: Fourth Quarter 2022
news.description: Time is flying and we are already in the third month of 2023 but that doesn’t mean we have forgotten 2022! Check out this post for the next edition of Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers, where we share a quick look into some of the usage statistics on our free question and answer forum in the final quarter of last year.

news.title: News & Notes on Google Local Services Ads: March 2023
news.description: We’re back with our first edition of News & Notes on Google Local Services Ads of 2023! Check out this post for the latest information from the Google Partner newsletter that matters for lawyers.

news.title: March 2023 Google Broad Core Algorithm Update Is Now Rolling Out
news.description: In keeping with their traditional updates, Google recently confirmed and began rolling out a new algorithm change. These important updates can have significant implications for search rankings. Keep reading to learn more!

news.title: Justia Free Resources: The Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center
news.description: The U.S. Supreme Court profoundly influences our society. To many, it is both familiar and opaque. In this post, we're exploring the newly redesigned Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center, a free resource shedding light on the highest tribunal in the nation.

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Health Care Law Center
news.description: Complex laws and regulations govern health care, to which access has expanded in recent years. The Justia Health Care Law Center provides consumers with free information about their rights in this area.
